CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of LAW of DATE reads :

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL ( on the exercise of parental rights ) of LAW of the Russian Federation provides as follows :
“ CARDINAL . The place of the children 's residence , if the parents live apart , shall be established by an agreement between the parents .
